title: SOLD - N43 Allen & Ginter Fogarty and Ryan

posts.post_title: SOLD - N43 Allen & Ginter Fogarty and Ryan
posts.post_content:
* both sold - thanks for looking *

Fogarty SGC Authentic due to trimmed left edge - sold

Ryan SGC 30 due to small spots of paper loss on reverse - sold

Both present extremely well. 

PM with interest. Paypal, check, or MO. Free ship.
If still available, I'll take N43 Fogarty
